select i.id, i.f_bill_no fBillNo, i.f_date fDate, order_id orderId, order_no orderNo, customer_id customerId, customer_name customerName, currency_name currencyName, model_type modelType, deputy_style deputyStyle, pay_style payStyle, rec_style recStyle, i.rate, is_send_email isSendEmail, send_time sendTime, land_tax_flag landTaxFlag, is_print isPrint, check_state_flag checkStateFlag, tax_remark taxRemark,i.pay_id payId, inv_customer_id invCustomerId, inv_customer_name invCustomerName, is_hgbill isHgbill, bank_id bankId, is_red isRed, ie.id bid, invoice_id invoiceId, ie.f_date bfDate, order_entry_id orderEntryId, item_name itemName, item_model itemModel, item_unit itemUnit, qty, ie.rate brate, fees_id feesId, formula, far_date farDate, fee_name feeName, ar_money arMoney, fee_alias feeAlias, fc_date fcDate, far_date_old farDateOld, other_cost_id otherCostId, item_name_inv itemNameInv, item_model_inv itemModelInv, ie.pay_id bpayId, pay_date payDate, pay_rate payRate, is_bill isBill, is_ar isAr from invoice i left join invoice_entry ie on i.id = ie.invoice_id and ie.voided = 0 where i.voided = 0
